abstract: Les Miles has coached L.S.U. to the No. 1 ranking, but when he speaks, strange things often come out.
snippet: Les Miles has coached L.S.U. to the No. 1 ranking, but when he speaks, strange things often come out.
lead_paragraph: Known for his daring, and sometimes puzzling, strategy on the field, Louisiana State Coach Les Miles has also managed to keep fans and reporters alike entertained with his singular vocabulary.

headline.main: Postcard From L.S.U.: Few Speak Coach's Language
